description: This file defines a class called AddDeviceAddressRequest that extends the Request class. It is responsible for creating a specific request message to add a device address, encapsulating the eui64 identifier, and sending a response.

classes.name: AddDeviceAddressRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to add a device address, extending the base Request class, and encapsulates the eui64 address needed for the operation.

methods.name: AddDeviceAddressRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a request ID and an EUI-64 address.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Implements the request execution logic by sending an addDeviceAddressResponse message.
